com.scvngr.levelup.core.util

Class DeviceIdentifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scvngr.levelup.core.util.DeviceIdentifier

  • @LevelUpApi(contract=INTERNAL)
@ThreadSafe
public final class DeviceIdentifier
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a utility class to uniquely determine the identity of the device.

      static java.lang.String getDeviceId(Context context)
      Gets the device ID for this device.

    • Method Detail

      • getDeviceId

        @Nullable
public static java.lang.String getDeviceId(@NonNull
                                    Context context)
        Gets the device ID for this device.

        Although this method won't generally return null, returning null is possible if the device is buggy.

        Parameters:
        context - the Application context.
        Returns:
        String representing the device's unique ID.
